alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Carolina; Catano; Guaynabo; San Juan; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 20 at 2:22PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Bayamon, Carolina, Catano, Guaynabo, San Juan and Trujillo Alto. * WHEN...Until 500 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 120 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorm development over Carolina, Trujillo Alto and San Juan, as part of the San Juan streamer. This activity will spread west-northwestward into northern Guaynabo, northern Bayamon, and Catano during the next few hours. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Bayamon; Carolina; Catano; Guaynabo; San Juan; Trujillo Alto
